issue.title: [Rust] limit unnecessary public
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11170](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11170). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Public things make it hard to change the signatures and calling conventions, perhaps we should have a check and reclaim some visibility
